data.eml:eml: First record of Damiria Keller, 1891 from Brazil, with the description of a new species (Poecilosclerida, Demospongiae, Porifera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santos, George Garcia, Pinheiro, Ulisses (2013): First record of Damiria Keller, 1891 from Brazil, with the description of a new species (Poecilosclerida, Demospongiae, Porifera). Zootaxa 3700 (4): 597-600, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3700.4.9
